item.title: Make your business more resilient in the digital age
item.description: Very humbled to write a guest post on Adrian Hornsby excellent blog where he provides guidance to help customers build resilient architecture and champions operational excellence. In this post I talk about what you need to think about to build a more resilient business fit for the digital age. Here is the link: https://medium.com/@adhorn/make-your-business-more-resilient-in-the-digital-age-888da3f5deaf
